title: Twitter is DONE
description: I don't know what is more parody, this list or actual Twitter I Wasted $420.69 on Walmart Tech:  $20 MacBook:  Tech We REALLY Wish Came Back:  Microsoft Has LOST Their Minds:  TikTok Made Me Buy It:   Subscribe!  Twitter:  Matt:  Instagram:   Chapter Titles ------------------------------- 0:00 Hello and Welcome 0:27 Jeremy Renner Official 1:20 Friendster 1:53 Bill Clinton Story Time 2:44 MySpace 3:49 Digg 4:10 CraigsList Missed Connections 5:00 LiveJournal 5:38 Parler 5:43 StumbleUpon 6:59 YikYak 7:28 Club Penguin 8:19 Google+ 9:27 What do you think?
